job_description.overview: TCS has been a great pioneer in feeding the fire of young techies like you. We are a global leader in the technology arena and there’s nothing that can stop us from growing together.
job_description.details:
What we are looking for
Role: Python devoloper
Experience Range: 6 – 8 Years
Location: Bangalore/Hyderabad/ Chennai/Pune/Kochi
Must-Have**
(Ideally should not be more than 3-5)
Required hands on experience on Python
Also, required knowledge on below technologies:
a. Flask
b. SqlAlchemy
c. Redis
d. MySql, MSSql Server
e. Html, Css, Javascripts, Jquery, Ajax
Experience required in Project Management tools like JIRA
Should have hand's on in Git for source control
Knowledge in Agile Development using Scrum
Hands on in CI/CD

Good-to-Have(Ideally should not be more than 3-5)

Good Communication
Should have knowledge on Machine Learning
